summary.bullet: Designed and optimized REST APIs using Python (FastAPI, Django), and Java for scalable applications.
Implemented backend services deployed on AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS, API Gateway) to enhance platform performance by 20%.
Enhanced database efficiency through SQL query optimization, resulting in a 30% reduction in execution time.
Built Microservice infrastructure using Event-Driven architecture, RabbitMQ, AsyncAPI, and Kubernetes, demonstrating expertise in modern backend technologies.
Build simple and complex web applications using PHP, and Laravel, demonstrating a strong understanding of web development frameworks.
Build solutions using Python, Django, and React, showcasing versatility in full-stack development.
Improved website SEO and load speed, increasing site traffic by 40% and aligning with best practices in software quality.
Implemented security best practices to reduce vulnerabilities by 85%, ensuring the reliability and security of the platform.

projects.name: inventory Management System
projects.description: A web application for managing inventory, built with Django and PostgreSQL, designed to handle large datasets efficiently.

projects.name: ChatBot App
projects.description: A chatbot application that integrates with OpenAI's API to provide conversational AI capabilities.

projects.name: Recipe API
projects.description: A RESTful API for managing recipes, built with Django and designed to handle a large number of requests efficiently.

projects.name: Customize NotePad
projects.description: A customizable notepad application built with Python and Tkinter, allowing users to create notes with styles and index.

projects.name: QR Manager
projects.description: An Android application for managing QR codes, built with Kotlin to provide a user-friendly interface for scanning and generating QR codes.
